title: option --coverage-text syntax issue
body:
I've just upgraded my local copy from PHPUnit 3.5.15 to 3.6.3 and try the new option --coverage-text on Windows platform.

I think there are an inconsistance syntax with options:

For example, if I use the --bootstrap, it's not mandatory to specify equal sign like 

--bootstrap=c:\path\to\boot_file.php

While with --coverage-text it seems that the equal sign is mandatory.

Example that run fine :

```
phpunit --bootstrap c:\PHP_Reflect_NS\PHP\Reflect\Autoload.php --coverage-text=c:\php\cover.txt .  
```

Example that raise an issue  :

```
phpunit --bootstrap c:\PHP_Reflect_NS\PHP\Reflect\Autoload.php --coverage-text c:\php\cover.txt .  
```
